descriptionHtml:
This is a recolour of spiffyjim\'s Trixie - A Female Jester Outfit
changed parts:
I made the outfit red ( only the body NOT the shoes nor the gloves but I may make them red later on)
The legs are now black.
And the Skirt is a little bit shorter and i changed the triangles at the bottom of the skirt to make it  look Ragged.
installation guide in the readme file in the download.

You will need spiffyjim\'s Trixie - A Female Jester Outfit
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3839
thanx for making your awesome mod ;)
you\'ll need to ask permission to spiffyjim if you want to modify this mod  
i have been given permission by spiffyjim to upload my version of the mod!
author: spiffyjim
